tutorial.introduction: Ласкаво просимо до Шлокасу! Пандитджі, чи не хотіли б ви продовжувати навчання?

library.introduction: This is a library. Here you can find shlokas you want to learn
library.search: You can search for shlokas in a list or by number and content. Try searching for a particular shloka
library.addVerse: To start learning a shloka, add it to your 'Inbox' deck by clicking 'Add'
library.end: Shloka has been added. Let's learn it. Go to 'Inbox'

inboxDeck.introduction: This is the Inbox deck. Each verse is broken down into two cards: a text and a translation
inboxDeck.swipeCardLeft: Swipe a card to the left to move to the next card
inboxDeck.flipCard: On the back of the card is a player and a word-for-word translation. Click to flip it over
inboxDeck.playDeclamation: Press the circle to start playback. Each line is repeated several times. The word-for-word translation is displayed below
inboxDeck.flipCardAgain: You can turn the card over and look at the text. Turn the card over
inboxDeck.swipeCardUp: Once you have learned a card, which can take several days, swipe it up. Swipe all the cards up
inboxDeck.end: You have memorized all the cards! Go to the 'Review' deck

reviewDeck.introduction: This is the Review deck. This is where the cards you have already memorized go. You don't have any cards planned for today, but you do have some for tomorrow. Let's move to tomorrow
reviewDeck.questionAndAnswer: On the front of the card is the question and on the back is the answer. Remember the answer and turn the card over to test your knowledge
reviewDeck.gradeCard: Give yourself a grade. Depending on your grade, the next repetition period will change and is displayed on the button
reviewDeck.goToFuture: Great! Now let's move forward a week! Several cards with different questions are created for each verse. Let's see how it looks!
reviewDeck.gradeAllCards: Try to answer all the cards and give yourself a grade
reviewDeck.end: Great! You've reviewd all the cards!
